casebody.data:
BALL
v.
BAYADA HOME HEALTH CARE, et al. 161P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 1, 2019 Joy H. Brewer, Attorney at Law, for Bayada Home Health Care, et al. Thomas F. Ramer, Attorney at Law, for Ball, Elizabeth. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of April 2019 by Defendants for Temporary Stay: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of May 2019." Davis, J. recused
